title: Clients not working for rp
body: I'm trying to buy rp off the client using a paypal but it wont go past the third step. I've tried multiple times with multiple amounts and it never goes anywhere. It lets me sign into paypal and "complete" the transaction but then jumps me back to the third step. No money has left my account as of yet and its been 3 days. Any help is appreciated.

replies.body: It almost sounds like there is a hiccup at Paypal's processing step that's failing to complete the transaction.  Do you have all of your information with paypal setup to work properly?  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look into your specific case individually with you.  Hopefully we can figure something out!
honestly ive tried several times to make a ticket but for some reason the riot page wont let me sign in and make a ticket ... im losing my mind lol
That's weird, is it at login?  What about trying on another browser?  You can also email us as well by sending an email to support@riotgames.com.  I hope that helps!
